free.name: Arkanoid - Eternal Battle - Space Scout Pack
free.detailed_description:
Download the DLC "SPACE SCOUT PACK" get access to 1 Exclusive TAITO ARKANOID Skin Background from the iconic franchise and exclusive Grade Frame Layouts.

Customize your online backgrounds during PvP matches against your opponents and get a little piece of History!

free.name: Need for Speed™ Payback: Pontiac Firebird & Aston Martin DB5 Superbuild Bundle
free.detailed_description: Two iconic cars that made quite the impression on the silver screen are now available for you to take for a ride in Fortune Valley. Both can be customized into outstanding superbuilds!
